# Pronostika - Betting Platform

This is a betting website similar to Polymarket with the following features:

## Key Features
- Admin-controlled bet categories (sports, social communications, etc.)
- User authentication system with 1000 starting points
- Flexible betting system with comprehensive tracking
- Admin panel for managing bets and users
- Real-time updates and point management

## Tech Stack
- Frontend: React with modern UI components
- Backend: Node.js with Express
- Database: PostgreSQL for data persistence
- Authentication: JWT-based authentication
- Real-time: WebSocket for live updates

## Project Structure
- `/frontend` - React application for user interface
- `/backend` - Express.js API server
- `/database` - SQL scripts and migrations
- `/shared` - Shared types and utilities

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for type safety
- Implement proper error handling
- Follow REST API conventions
- Use responsive design principles
- Maintain comprehensive logging
